subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: The family of Bryan Pata, the University of Miami player who was fatally shot last November, will get $2 million from the insurance companies of the apartment complex where he was murdered, family lawyers said. Pata was shot outside The Colony Apartment in Kendall, Fla., on Nov. 7. The apartment complex did not provide the 24-hour security it had advertised, and several outdoor lights were obscured or not working, particularly where the shooting took place, said the family’s lawyers.
